item.title: DNA seen through the eyes of a coder (or, If you are a hammer, everything looks like a nail) - Bert Hubert's writings
item.description: Updates: 12th of September 2021: I’m writing a book on DNA! If you want to become a beta reader, or have suggestions, I’d love to hear from you! 8th of January 2021: This article has been revised and updated, scientifically and in terms of dead links. Revision made by Tomás Simões (@putadagravidade / tomasprsimoes@gmail.com). Feel free to contact me if I made a mistake. 25th of August 2017: This page has led to a two-hour presentation called DNA: The code of Life as presented at SHA 2017.

item.title: How do I programmatically reposition monitors in a multiple-monitor system?
item.description: Say you’re looking to write a tool to manipulate monitor positions. What functions should you be calling? The function to call is Change­Display­Settings­Ex with a DEVMODE whose dmFields has the DM_POSITION flag set. Put the desired upper left corner of the monitor in the dmPosition.x and dmPosition.y fields.
